mapper.select: SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof;

SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof WHERE p.id_Pgm = #{programId};

SELECT sugang.id_sugang AS idEnrollment, sugang.id_student AS idStudent, program.pgm_Name AS pgmName, program.id_Pgm AS idPgm, program.id_Cate AS idCate, sugang.Sugang_St_Dt AS SugangStDt, sugang.status AS status, sugang.cource_Status AS courseStatus, program.st_Dt AS stDt, program.end_Dt AS endDt, program.pgm_Fee AS pgmFee, category.cate_Name AS cateName, class_room.room_Name AS roomName, professor.name AS name FROM Sugang sugang JOIN Program program ON sugang.id_Pgm = program.id_Pgm JOIN Category category ON program.id_Cate = category.id_Cate JOIN ClassRoom class_room ON program.id_Room = class_room.id_Room JOIN Professor professor ON program.id_Prof = professor.id_Prof WHERE sugang.id_student = #{idStudent} AND sugang.cource_Status = true;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Sugang (id_student, id_Pgm, id_Cate, st_Dt, status, course_status) VALUES (#{commonId}, #{idPgm},#{idCate}, now(), '신청중', false)
